abstractText: The rate of smolt to adult return (SAR) isestimatedamong outgoing juveniles ofknown release, and detected return numbers ofPIT-tagged adult fish. The tags in juvenile fish which were PIT tagged in upstream tributariesare potentially read as the fish pass through the coils of detectors installed in the collection/bypass channels of mainstem dams. The method randomly pre-assigns the tagged fish to transported and in-riverstudy groups prior to their emigration through the hydrosystem.
title: PIT based estimation of  smolt to adult return (SAR), Transport: In-river (TIR) ratio and D ratio v1.0
